text: I was looking around for the next project to work on now that the Dave-via-email project is done, I hope -- it's the worst kind of software in the world. Talk about small pieces loosely joined. Anyway that's done now, praise Murphy. I was thinking after reading this piece about protocols over platforms, which I could not agree with more, that I have an almost-finished JavaScript implementation of XML-RPC, running on client and server. Since it's my second time through this area, I did it better than last time. It's just a matter of writing docs, testing, and getting other people interested/excited, and most important updating the XML-RPC website, which hasn't been touched in many years. Might be just the project for my newly powerful blog.
